displayName.english: Who, pray tell, will you call?

description.english: Complete Wails and Dancing Shadows collection
Complete Ghoulish Behavior collection
Complete Imposing Presence collection
Complete Flesh and Bone collection
Complete Undead Authority collection
Mastered the whirlwind, where time bends and breaths are brief
Found your way through the thick veil of uncertainty
Strings pulled, the marionette's journey unfolds
Unlocked the box where danger sleeps
Walked the solitary path, where shadows whisper secrets
Ventured into the void, senses your only guide
Ascended to the zenith of destructive might, unchained and unrivaled
Survived the brittle ballet of the one-hit dance
Advance through uncertainty with random skills, no HUD, and a wary eye on every chest.
Master the darkest depths, outsmart the cursed chests, and wield unlimited power to victory.
Outpaced the shadow, leaving time in the dust
Start at the beginning, and don’t look back
Sometimes, the path to enlightenment leads through the dark corridors of the mind
Sometimes choice is a luxury. If you abuse it, you shall pay the price
If you fall in love with Desna, waking up will be truly painful
Only the echo of your footsteps resonates — listen closely to what they reveal
Are you sure of where you stand? Check again, and often—truth shifts with your focus. In the end, only your senses will prevail
1.. 2.. 3.. GO! Destiny waits for no one
Boundless potential awaits those who push beyond limits. When power peaks, so does the challenge
Fortify thy defenses and ready thyself for the ultimate trial, old friend
